title: Ticket #2271: CREAM user mapping incorrect in gridmanager
description:
The key used for creating CreamResource objects in the gridmanager should match how a CREAM server maps users. Each CREAM user has a separate namespace for lease ids and delegated proxies. The server considers two credentials as the same user if the X509 subject and first VOMS attribute match. Additional VOMS attributes are ignored.

Currently, the gridmanager creates a separate CreamResource object if the X509 subject or any VOMS attribute is different.
